long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Movie Nights are back!

Miss watching movies and sharing laughs with your friends or family? Friday lets you have a great movie experience with people anywhere in the world in just two clicks.

Watch content synced in real time, laugh and cry together with emojis across 14+ OTT Platforms with support for more coming soon. Enjoy theater like experience at home with friends, partners, family or just by yourself!

Join Beta (beta.friday.social) to be a part of the change in social watching as we work towards making movie watching fun again.
